RECOMMENDATION
Focus on improving the **Rewriter and Router components**, as shown by the very low scores on **conversational (0.0)** and **distracting (0.25)** questions. Additionally, ensure better topic coverage in the **knowledge base**, since several topics like *Data Protection Impact Assessment* and *Data Subject Rights under GDPR* have scores of **0.0**, indicating missing or poorly indexed information.
